Reviews.Title: “FRAUDULENTLY CHARGED!!! STAY AWAY”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: They charged me for two different reservations on two separate nights when I only booked one room for one night. Instead of dealing with the situation, they ignore my messages and won't let me talk to a manager. They told my bank that I didn't show up for the second reservation and then would not revoke the charge for $85. Stay away. These people are dishonest and should not be trusted with a credit card number.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all cost!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff/management was very dishonest. They informed us that there would be plenty of room for a charter bus to park. NO WAY! Then tried to charge a room service charge and continental breakfast even though we NEVER checked in, (Cancelled immediately upon arrival) and the continental breakfast is listed as complimentary!!

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: CarmenSanDiego
Reviews.Content: Good Points: Denny's Restaurant right next door, walking distance to shops. Bad Points: Bathroom fan off the wall, carpets filthy, 2 towels only, bedlinen questionably clean, itsy bitsy TV, unsmiling receptionist spoke in monosyllables, continental breakfast not worth getting up for. Stayed one night, no choice. Don't ruin your vacation by staying here!

Reviews.Title: “BUGET YES TRASHY NO!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband stayed for 5 nights and had a good time.The houskeepers kept the room tidy and neat. the manager was always asking if we needed anything.The swimming pool was nice and its so easy cause k-mart is on one side and dennys on the other. one day we got no towels but i called the front desk and the problem was resolved.All in all we enjoyed ourselves and would return!!:)

Reviews.Title: “Wish I had listened to Trip Advisor”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend running or driving as fast as you can in the opposite direction from this dump. We managed to tough it out for one night only because I was too tired to find another hotel at midnight. The room smelled awful when we walked in and had the tiniest tv I have ever seen in a hotel. The bathroom was absolutely filthy and scary. There was mold and scum everywhere. We had three towels total in the room and no bathmat. The continental breakfast is a complete joke and ours was cut short by three Kissimmee police cars pulling up to deal with another guest who was much more vocal in his displeasure with the hotel. We checked out immediately and moved down the road. My suggestion is to not even bother checking in. I wouldn't stay at this hotel again if they paid me to.

Reviews.Title: “Not good!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Not a good deal at all, we got what we thought was a great deal but quickly realized, YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR! It is not clean at all. It is very loud, we were woke up at least once each night by people screaming or car alarms going off and the hotel staff did nothing about it. Also it is not convienient to Disney at all. OH, Also, I reserved a crib before we came. When we got there they said they had none. After arguing with then for 5 minutes a manager came over and said, ok I have a brand new one in the storage room you can use if you agree to pay 5 dollars a night for it. I did because I had no other choice. They brought the crib up and no one could figure out how ito put it together. When we came back for the night we had a Dirty old pack and play sat up in our room!! Not a family hotel all all!! Don't ruin your trip to disney!!!

Reviews.Title: “bad ...really bad!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The room was dirty and not as advertised. We were expecting two quen sized beds...got two doubles....phone didn't work...would have checked out immediately ...but there wasn't another room in Orlando.. (Daytona weekend) A variety of room s and suites are advertised....but they are all the same size. I would rather sleep in my car.I could go on and on ...but you get the picture...

Reviews.Title: “GREAT BY THE VALUE AND ATMOSPHERE”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay, its a family friendly hotel, friendly and courtsey staff, clean rooms and conveniently located. Its worth by the price and services offered. We were on ythe tight budget and this hotel meet our expectation and provided us what we were looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Trash”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Worst hotel i ever stayed in. Only stay here if you are on a really strict budget, and get a rate of <$20. The carpets are dirty, along with the rest of the room. The beds are large, but 1 of 2 of the queen sized beds had a large lump, and the other was broken. THE BATHTUB HAD COCKROACHES IN IT. This hotel is not sanitary, and is not where you want to stay, beacuse it will ruin your trip, it did mine to Disney World. The connentinental breakfast is also trash, just cereal + bagels. Not a good place for a family, i had to learn that the hard way. The only good thing was my bed was made every day (unecpected). This is not the place you want to stay with your family, i found that out the hard way. Bottom line, it is not the 2.5 star hotel it is reated, at best it is a 1 star. It is about 8 miles from Disney world, and therefore not convinent, or in the disney world area.

Reviews.Title: “Believe it or not, Bring your own tp”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Numerous trips to the office for items such as no tp for over 24 hrs.(they didn't even have any to give you), no washcloths, no bathmats, no working vacuum sweepers(they used brooms), never even made beds one day and lied about it, what dlx breakfast(the health board halted it), paid extra for suites in which we didn't get, hog hole laundry(there excuse it's independently ran),etc. We had 3 rooms reserved for one week. We made an appointment with Pamela Ferber in which she agreed to credit back two nights. That's never happened and hotel has not contacted them to issue the credit. I've spent three months trying to get my credit. GO ELSEWHERE TO STAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Hell”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have to tell you that staying at that hotel was disgusting. The carpet was so dirty my feet got dirty walking on it, it was a regular room with a pull out shoved into to it. There was no stock of toiletries, towels or toilet paper. They knew from the reservation that there would be six of us in the room, there were two towels, no washclothes, no floor mat. When we asked for more towels, they offered two. The soap that was in there was from Ramada inn???????? The pool's only security was a chain link lock that they chained at 10pm, other than that, with a little one, we were right by the pool, with no self locking latch. The fan in the bathroom was so loud and rattled so bad we went to the bathroom with the light off. I wouldnt have showered there to save my life.

Reviews.Title: “Run - Please Run”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: What a dump! Nothing worked - no phone, no smoke detector, no towels, no working ice machine, etc. If you plan to stay here, bring along a gun!! It's really scary.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from this one!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place is a dump! We had three rooms for seven nights - big mistake! They would not clean our rooms every day. The carpet in "our" room was so dirty that is made our white socks black - just like if we would have walked around outside without shoes on. My "mothers" room the bed was broke and the head of the bed slumped onto the floor. The second room that they gave my mother had a broken microwave. Our room had a broken shower head. All the showers in the place had mold growing around them. They would not leave clean towels or toilet paper in your room. You would have to go to the desk and get some yourself and then they would only give you a half of roll of toilet paper and two towels. No wash clothes or bath mats. The one day when I went to get soap and toilet paper they lady gave me paper towels and told me that they were out of toilet paper. The breakfast consisted of white bread and english muffins with butter and coffee. The juice and milk thing had been out of order for awhile. ALL the ice mechines in the hotel were out of order. The TV's in the rooms are really small. The ladies at the front desk kept blaming everything on the fact that the manager was in Canada and the owner was in Iraq so no one was around to order supplies or anything. Also, this is not a maingate hotel! It is quite a way from Disney. I would not recemend this hotel to anyone. STAY AWAY!!

Reviews.Title: “Welcome to the worst place in Disney area!!! Be aware, guest.”
Reviews.Author: I_am_travel_junkie
Reviews.Content: My goodness. We visited Disney World Area for the first time and were so unfortunate to stay at this dirty house. Every day our room was forgoten to be cleaned. Excuse? "Sorry, you have to stop by the main office and remind us every morning", was their response. Blunkets and bed sheets had holes in them: maybe they were saved from WWII or something. It looked like everybody else in Orlando were the friendliest people on earth...except people who work and run this doghouse. Worst experience ever. Super not advisable.

HotelInfo.Name: Regency Express Disney Maingate
HotelInfo.Address: 2407 West Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway, US Highway 192, Kissimmee, FL 34741
